inclusion.criterion: axillary lymph nodes detected clinically or with superficial ultrasound on both axillae
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: detected clinically and with superficial ultrasound

inclusion.criterion: included lymph nodes with minimal axial diameter (4mm)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: neoadjuvant chemo-, immune- or endocrine therapy
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: candidate for tumor resection prior to chemotherapy

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with HER2-positive and ER/PR-negative breast cancer, metastatic lesions on CXR.
